en_US.project_summary: Bittrex Global is one of the most secure trading platforms in the world. Built on Bittrex’s cutting-edge technology, we provide an institutional grade experience for professional and novice customers alike.

zh_CN.project_summary: Bittrex Global是世界上最安全的交易平台之一。基于Bittrex的尖端技术，我们为专业和新手客户提供机构级的体验。
